As an Owner you have financial needs that should drive your capital decisions

Portfolio Management

Monetize a portion of gains to manage portfolio risk and/or recycle capital

Tax & Estate Planning

Including all major capital decisions. No forced sales, no meddling LPs. Investors benefit from streamlined reporting and analytical tools.

Investor Relations

Maintain strong LP relationships by offering liquidity independent of a sale

Status Quo

LP control rights over major decisions including sale/refinancing

Capital gains taxes, deal level transfer taxes/other transaction costs

Need to actively seek reinvestment options for sale proceeds

Diverse LP base asking repetitive, distracting questions

With Pillar

You maintain control, just like a fund GP

Avoid inopportune sales while still providing liquidity to LPs

You maintain ownership, preserving asset management fees and deferring taxes/costs of a whole asset sale

Comprehensive reporting and LP forum enables investors to answer each others' questions

The Dev Solution

Facilitate Efficient Access to Capital

Depth and breadth of capital pool allows for timely execution along risk profiles and across the capital stack.

Owner Always Maintains Control

Including all major capital decisions. No forced sales, no meddling LPs. Investors benefit from streamlined reporting and analytical tools.

All With Lower Fees

Solve your needs while managing fees. Relative to competitors, we’re up to 75% cheaper - we focus on providing innovative solutions to real problems, without reinventing the wheel.

How it Works

Our process for owners of institutional-quality assets

Dev Wire underwrites the GP to institutional standards

GP does not pass due diligence

Dev Wire works with GP to shore up shortfalls by introducing third-party service providers and/or instituting asset management oversight

GP passes due diligence

Sponsor and Asset are onboarded onto platform

Dev Wire may close the asset on balance sheet and syndicate the risk or offer for best efforts execution

Post-close ongoing asset reporting via automated ingestion of financial data
